page.title: 11FETES
page.content: FETES THE BUXTED SCHOOL BARBEQUE On Saturday 6th July we had the sckool Barbeque on the field.There were lots of thing to do, there was the bouncing castle, skittles, pony and trap rides, hoopla, throwing the welly, naming the teddy bear's birthday, co co nut shy, fish hook, catch a duck, ball in the hole,bottle stall, plant stall,pot stall, ice cream stall and bowling at the Headmaster in the cricket nets. W had chicken and sausages plus a roll and salad to eat. On the hoopla I won a full size marathon bar and 2 packets of crisps. There were nearly 400 people and we raised Â£200 which was very good. The weather was fine and we had a great time.
